definition: to make an appointment/to invite/approximately/pact/treaty/to economize/to restrict/to reduce (a fraction)/concise
to weigh in a balance or on a scale
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: After graduating from NYU Endodontics, Dr. Berlin moved to Florida.
sentences.chinese: 从纽约大学毕业后，他移居佛罗里达。

sentences.english: Marion Nestle, a high-profile professor of nutrition at New York University, agrees.
sentences.chinese: 马里昂雀巢的营养高调纽约大学教授对此表示赞同。

sentences.english: Lihong Liu is a doctoral student in the Institute of Fine Arts at New York University.
sentences.chinese: 刘礼红是纽约大学艺术学院博士生。

sentences.english: New York University students on campus.
sentences.chinese: 纽约大学校园里的学生。

sentences.english: What do you think about NYU?
sentences.chinese: 你觉得纽约大学怎么样？

sentences.english: Hsueh Ava is a visual artist and holds a D. A . (Doctor of Arts) New York University, N.
sentences.chinese: 视觉艺术家，纽约大学艺术创作与理论博士。

sentences.english: The medical center at New York University is one of the clinical sites for the study.
sentences.chinese: 纽约大学的医学中心是这次研究的临床实验中心之一。

sentences.english: After nearly flunking out of New York University in 1942, Mr.
sentences.chinese: 1942年，休伊特险些因不及格而从纽约大学退学。

sentences.english: Patrick camehome for good in March and is now enrolled in a master’s program at New York University.
sentences.chinese: 帕特里克3月退役，现在是纽约大学的硕士生。

sentences.english: You are an NYU student. Are there any attractive guys at your school?
sentences.chinese: 你是纽约大学的学生。你们学校有没有帅哥啊？

pinyin: Ge1 lun2 bi3 ya4 Da4 xue2
Bin1 xi1 fa3 ni2 ya4 Da4 xue2
